pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5: Asambhinnena vilepanena, an unusual expression. According to Sp-ṭ.3.1.357, asambhinnena means “with [make-up] not smeared, not lost”, amakkhitena, anaṭṭhena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8: [ See essay on mattika and cuṇṇa.]
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21: For addhayojana, “half a yojana”, see essay on Measures.
